profile.description:
More than 10 years of experience developing with web technologies. My field of expertise is CSS, and I am a master in Javascript.
I also master the technologies that have to do with the backroom of the web, such as PHP and Python. My purpose is to deliver any project in a timely manner, with the highest quality, and with absolute respect for the good practices.
